a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Percentage of females living alone in the United States, by age, 1900 to
The share of female Americans living alone, by age. An individual is defined as living alone where there is one person in the
household and does not live in group quarters. See the source tab for more details.
